alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 21 at 10:18AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. .Recent heavy rainfall has caused water levels to rise on the Peace River. For the Peace...including Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River at Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Peace River Estates floods affecting several dozen homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 12.8 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.9 feet on 07/29/1943. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 9.5 Thu 9 am 10.5 12.0 12.7 12.5 12.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 330 AM EDT.
